name: Clownpiece RPG
description:
Clownpiece RPG's English version is finally here!

Clownpiece is suddenly summoned by Hecatia, who tells her that her Earth and Moon orbs have disappeared and asks her to adventure out into Gensokyo (and other places) to look for them! There are some (not very hidden) hidden characters to recruit, too!

*Features skills that use TP and MP, as well as sometimes HP and MP, and a special way of displaying that info. (You'll understand better if you check the readme.)

*This is my first game, so the balance may be rough in places, but I'm proud of the fact that I finished the entire game and an EX scenario for it.

*Also features some puzzle elements.

Development Period:

2016/04/30 -- Started work on the game for the first time.

2019/01/28 -- Finished the EX scenario, marking the game's completion.

2021/04/17 -- The most recent update to the Japanese version.

2022/03/03 -- The release of the English version!
